snippet: A new community college tackles the preconceptions of students from backgrounds where work is seen not as an outgrowth of one's passions, but as something negative or scarce.
abstract: A new community college tackles the preconceptions of students from backgrounds where work is seen not as an outgrowth of one's passions, but as something negative or scarce.

headline.main: Educating Students From Cultures That See Work as Exploitation
